articles.content: The Las Vegas Raiders' problems in the red zone have been a thorn in their back since 2018. The team was constantly moving the football at ease to only come up with field goals. It all came to fruiti… [+1674 chars]

articles.title: Bryce Harper on Nick Castellanos signing: 'It's a great day to be a Phillie' - NBC Sports
articles.description: Bryce Harper awakened to the news in his Clearwater Beach condo early Saturday morning and "was blown away." By Jim Salisbury
articles.content:
CLEARWATER, Fla. -- Bryce Harper awakened to the news in his Clearwater Beach condo early Saturday morning and "was blown away."
A few moments later, his roommate came downstairs.
